mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, member_birth as memberBirth, member_email as memberEmail, enroll_date as enrollDate, member_gender as memberGender, member_filename as memberFilename, member_filepath as memberFilepath from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
